turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order a coffee drink please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, where would you like to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks on Main and Niagra St. in Buffalo

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok what kind of drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a caffe mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great and what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what type of milk in that grande caffe mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: whole milk!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, and can you add whipp cream on it too?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I will request they put whipped cream on it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: An you have an account on with Starbucks on file correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, so no payment details are needed

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, just to confirm you would like a grande caffe mocha with whole milk and whipped cream, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your drink is on order and should be available for pickup within 10 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good, thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you as well, have a great day
